
snap(0,0,0)

sky(10000,10000,10000)
fog(10000,10000,10000)
ground(10000,10000,10000)

fadefrom(268435300)

name(MADNESS X Infinity)

nlaps(20)

set(34,1750,1750,250,-90)p
chk(58,1750,0,250,0)
set(34,1750,-1750,250,180)p
chk(58,0,-1750,250,90)
set(34,-1750,-1750,250,90)p
chk(58,-1750,0,250,0)
set(34,-1750,1750,250,0)p
chk(58,0,1750,250,90)

fix(61,0,9900,-99929000,0)
fix(61,0,-9900,-99929000,0)
fix(61,9900,0,-99929000,90)
fix(61,-9900,0,-99929000,90)

maxb(7,-10000,-15000)
maxt(7,10000,-15000)
maxr(7,10000,-15000)
maxl(7,-10000,-15000)

set(55,10000,10000,250,-45)
set(55,10000,-10000,250,45)
set(55,-10000,-10000,250,-45)
set(55,-10000,10000,250,45)

set(58,0,1750,250,0)po
set(34,-1750,1750,250,0)po
set(58,-1750,0,250,90)po
set(34,-1750,-1750,250,90)po
set(58,0,-1750,250,0)po
set(34,1750,-1750,250,180)po
set(58,1750,0,250,90)po
set(34,1750,1750,250,-90)po
